messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: firewalls and electronic sabatoge
messages.msgSnippet: I watched Enemy of the State tonight.  Interesting that this should come up at the same time... Tracy On 15 Jul 2000, at 16:15, Lynda wrote: Because there are
messages.messageBody:
I watched Enemy of the State tonight. Interesting that this should
come up at the same time...

Tracy

On 15 Jul 2000, at 16:15, Lynda wrote:

Because there are all kinds of evil folks out there
that just might sneek
up on them and take their Men in Black uniforms away
from them???? 

Excuse the sarcasm but I don't know, they have more
excuses than Carter use
to have little liver pills! AND, the thing that bugs
me the most is that
most of the drivel that comes out is soooo lame they've
gotten think most
people are stupid enough to believe it! Geez, and our
tax dollars pay for
this sh*t!

Lynda

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: firewalls and electronic sabatoge
messages.msgSnippet: Because there are all kinds of evil folks out there that just might sneek up on them and take their Men in Black uniforms away from them???? Excuse the sarcasm
messages.messageBody:
Because there are all kinds of evil folks out there that just might sneek
up on them and take their Men in Black uniforms away from them????

Excuse the sarcasm but I don't know, they have more excuses than Carter use
to have little liver pills! AND, the thing that bugs me the most is that
most of the drivel that comes out is soooo lame they've gotten think most
people are stupid enough to believe it! Geez, and our tax dollars pay for
this sh*t!

Lynda

----------
> From: Corallyn Berger <hape2day@...>
> To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: firewalls and electronic sabatoge
> Date: Saturday, July 15, 2000 2:56 PM
>
> Why is the FBI snooping on people's internet
> connections?
>
>
> --- Lynda <lurine@...> wrote:
> > Talk about timing, in this morning's paper what
> > should appear:
> >
> > "Earthlink, FBI reach agreement
> > Atlanta (AP)--EarthLink Inc. said Friday it has
> > reached an agreement with
> > the FBI to avoid future use of an electronic
> > surveillance device called
> > Carnivore that disrupted Internet access for some
> > EarthLink customers
> > earlier this year.
> >
> > The Atlanta-based company, which has about 4.2
> > million subscribers
> > nationwide, said it had installed the snooping
> > software for the FBI at a
> > data center in Pasadena earlier this year after it
> > lost a decision on the
> > matter in federal court."
> >
> > Interesting, very, very interesting.
> >
> > Lynda
> >
> >
> >
>
>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: firewalls and electronic sabatoge
messages.msgSnippet: Why is the FBI snooping on people s internet connections? ... __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Get Yahoo! Mail – Free email
messages.messageBody:
Why is the FBI snooping on people's internet
connections?


--- Lynda <lurine@...> wrote:
> Talk about timing, in this morning's paper what
> should appear:
>
> "Earthlink, FBI reach agreement
> Atlanta (AP)--EarthLink Inc. said Friday it has
> reached an agreement with
> the FBI to avoid future use of an electronic
> surveillance device called
> Carnivore that disrupted Internet access for some
> EarthLink customers
> earlier this year.
>
> The Atlanta-based company, which has about 4.2
> million subscribers
> nationwide, said it had installed the snooping
> software for the FBI at a
> data center in Pasadena earlier this year after it
> lost a decision on the
> matter in federal court."
>
> Interesting, very, very interesting.
>
> Lynda
>
>
>
